title: [FEATURE] Scribe Discovery Search - Handle discovery tickets by searching for missing programs
description: Add discovery ticket handling to ScribeWorker that searches for missing programs in the input directory and source files. When ticket has metadata.discovery=True: (1) Search input_dir for files matching program_id, (2) If found as file, process as normal documentation, (3) If not found as file, call _search_symbol_in_sources(). Files to modify: war_rig/workers/scribe_pool.py. Acceptance criteria: Discovery tickets detected and handled specially; File search covers all extensions; Symbol search finds CALL, PERFORM, CICS patterns.

title: [FEATURE] Symbol Documentation in Parent File - Document internal routines within parent files
description: When a searched symbol is found as a paragraph/section in another file, document it as an internal routine within that parent file's documentation. Add InternalRoutine model to templates.py with fields: name, routine_type, parent_file, line_number, brief_description, discovered_from. Add internal_routines field to DocumentationTemplate. Add _document_as_internal_routine() method to ScribeWorker. Files to modify: war_rig/workers/scribe_pool.py, war_rig/models/templates.py. Dependencies: DISC-001.

title: [FEATURE] External/Missing Program Documentation - Document programs that cannot be found
description: When a program cannot be found as a file or symbol, create documentation marking it as external or missing with metadata about search performed and likely explanations. Add _document_missing_program() method with: is_external flag, status (external/missing), called_from list, search_performed metadata, likely_explanation (inferred from naming patterns), recommended_action. Files to modify: war_rig/workers/scribe_pool.py. Dependencies: DISC-001.

title: [FEATURE] System Utility Auto-Classification - Pattern-based detection of IBM system utilities
description: Automatically classify IBM system utilities by naming pattern (IEF*, IEB*, IDC*, DFH*, DSN*, CEE*, IGY*, CSQ*, etc.) and update call graph analysis to track them separately. Add SYSTEM_UTILITY_PATTERNS constant with prefix patterns. Add _detect_system_utility() method. Add auto_classified_utilities set to CallGraphAnalysis. Update generate_system_design_md() to show auto-classified utilities. Files to modify: war_rig/analysis/call_graph.py.

title: [FEATURE] Challenger Discovery Validation - Validate discovery ticket search completeness
description: Enhance Challenger validation to verify discovery searches were thorough before approving closure. Add _validate_discovery_ticket() method that checks: (1) All expected file extensions searched, (2) Symbol search patterns applied (CALL, PERFORM), (3) External/missing explanation quality, (4) Internal routine parent file exists. Create blocking questions if validation fails. Files to modify: war_rig/workers/challenger_pool.py. Dependencies: DISC-001, DISC-002, DISC-003.

title: [FEATURE] Call Graph Status Indicators - Visual distinction for program status in diagrams
description: Enhance call graph visualization to distinguish between documented, internal_routine, external, and missing programs using different Mermaid node shapes and colors. Add program_status dict to CallGraphAnalysis. Update _generate_mermaid_diagram() with status-based shapes: documented=rectangle, internal_routine=stadium, external=parallelogram, missing=flag. Add color-coded styling and legend. Update generate_markdown_report() with status breakdown table. Files to modify: war_rig/analysis/call_graph.py. Dependencies: DISC-004.
